column1: #Text=Katara says : " This is bad , really bad . "
#Text=Sokka says : " We 're putting everything we 've got into busting these braces , but it 's taking too long ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Maybe we do n't need to cut all the way through .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then I 'll go to the top of this thing and deliver the final blow .
#Text=" Aang says : " Everyone inside that wall .
#Text=The whole world is counting on us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The whole world minus the Fire Nation that is .
